content.webTitle: Edinburgh festival podcast: The Guardian Live at the Gilded Balloon, with Jason Byrne

fields.headline: The Guardian Live at the Gilded Balloon, with Jason Byrne
fields.bodyText: Our host Miles Jupp is joined on stage at The Gilded Balloon in Edinburgh by legendary singer songwriter, Dean Friedman, ginger comedic colossus Jason Byrne, newcomer and hotly tipped stand-up Sarah Millican. Also in the show are the Guardian's online entertainment editor Paul MacInnes and the country singing icon Tina C The podcast is recorded in front of a live studio audience every day at noon - if you're in Edinburgh for the festival, we'd love to see you there. Tickets are free, and can be reserved by calling the Gilded Balloon box office on 0131-668 1633. More details on the venue's website. Warning: the show contains strong language.
